comments.content: All I need is a brief and simple summary of the rules of the basic deck please!!!!!!!!!! :D [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_biggrin.png]

choose up to 3 heros.
at least 50 cards.

no more than 3 copies of each card, by title, in your deck.

 

is this what you're looking for?
